title: 50 years of Resources Policy – What is next? Key areas of future research

Author(s): David Fleming-Muñoz, Gary Campbell, Yalin Ley, Andrea Arratia-Solar, Patricio Aroca, Miguel Atienza, Eyup Dogan, Gaurav Ghosh, Alexander James, Mustafa Kumral, Thomas Measham, Mare Sarr, Muhammad Shahbaz, Haoying Wang, Jeremy Weber
